channel.title: AotearoaPk || Need Staff
channel.description:
[center][u][b]Community[/b][/u] Forums: http://aotearoapk.com/ Updates: http://aotearoapk.com/index.php?/forum/2-updates/ Desktop Client: http://aotearoapk.com/index.php?/forum/25-client-download/
AotearoaPk is a old school Pk / Economy server at the moment we are still in beta fixing bugs and adding more updates but we welcome anyone to come play.
[u][b]Features[/b][/u]
Working Settitle command Working title command Clan system Old school items ( Acb , sotd etc ) Stable economy Pkp system Clean home And a lot more!
[u][b]Images[/b][/u]
TITLES [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2n6510l.png[/img]
PKP STORES [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/35a875x.png[/img]
CUSTOM ITEMS ( there are more ) [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/121crr6.png[/img]
OLDSCHOOL HOME [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2iglr0z.png[/img]
DZONE [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/zt9m45.png[/img]
More will be added to this topic so keep updated ![/center]
